subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Cubs bounced back to even the best-of-five series at one game apiece, and they will have their ace, Jake Arrieta, set to pitch Game 3 on Monday at Wrigley Field.
snippet: The Cubs bounced back to even the best-of-five series at one game apiece, and they will have their ace, Jake Arrieta, set to pitch Game 3 on Monday at Wrigley Field.
